overview_of_class: Basic concepts: topologies, connectedness, compactness, separation axioms. Geometric concepts, including simplicial complexes and manifolds. Prerequisite for 344-1: 320-1 or equivalent; for 344-2: 344-1 and 330-1 or equivalent.
name: Introduction to Topology
title: WCAS MATH 344-1-81 Introduction to Topology

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Basic concepts: topologies, connectedness, compactness, separation axioms. Geometric concepts, including simplicial complexes and manifolds. Prerequisite for 344-1: 320-1 or equivalent; for 344-2: 344-1 and 330-1 or equivalent.

subject: MATH
